title: Which martyrs were awarded with medals after the World War with their respective governments? - Quora

response.answer_text: Wars always result in dead bodies and widows cry which create distruction for years in society and which money used for welfare of country used in arms deals and some brave soldiers who were awarded with honors are Joseph B Adkison  He was sergeant in US army and lost his life while captured a machine gun position in Bellicourt France and he received medal of bravery from US army for his brave act and he lived upto 1965. Albert E Baesel  He was second lieutenant and corporal national guard and he joined service in 1912 and in 1918, he was in Ivoiry France when he lost his life while defending a wounded soldier and he was from 148th infantry regiment 37th division. He was awarded by medal of honor. David B Barkley  He was served in US army as private rank and his unit was 356th infantry regiment 89th division. He lost his life while in swam and meuse river and reconnoitered german positions under heavy fire and drowned in return trip and recieved Medal of honor by US army Croix de guerra by france, Croce al merito de guerra by italy. Robert L Blackwell  He joined US army in 1917 with private rank and he was from unit K company 119 infantry regiment 30th infantry division. He lost his life when trying to carry a message call for reinforcement while heavy fire in saint souplet france and honored with Medal of honor, Croce al merito de Guerra, Cruz de Guerra. Erwin R Bleckley  He joined US army in 1917 and he was second lieutenant by rank with US army air force with units 130th field artillery 35th division, 50th aero squadron and lost his life while supplying lost battalion air attack by Harold Goettler. He received honour medal of honor and also junior military aviator badge. Marcellus H Chiles  He joined US army in 1917 in infantry branch with rank captain. He lost his life while wounded still he fought with machine gun fire and lead to serve his country. He get medal of honor. Parker F Dunn  He joined US army as private first class rank and he worked in Company A, 312th infantry, 78th division and lost his life while carry a message for his country. He received Medal of honor. George Dilboy  He served in 2 armies which are greek aIrmy from 1912 to 1913 and US army from 1916 to 1918 and he fought 4 wars first balkan war, second balkan war and lost his life during mortally wounded with machine gun and he fought until silencing the machine gun. He was awarded by Medal of honor. James D Heriot  He was from company I, 118th infantry regiment and 30th infantry division and he lost his life when single handedly attached and captured machine gun nest and and killed when attacked the second. He was awarded by Medal of honor. Many more soldiers from various countries lost lives to save country proud, honour and protect respect of country. We seen many times many soldiers save life of enemy soldiers which shows humanity. Wars always spoil countries which should be ignored and peace should be established.
